data.title: 1200 Granite Falls Blvd.
data.meta_description: Case MA 19-01 (Approved)MA 19-01 is a map amendment to rezone three parcels (1758598900, 1758599639, and 1758690672) from Residential 1 (R-1) to Residential 3 (R-3). The parcels total approximately 7.35 acres and are located at 1200 Granite Falls Blvd.
data.text:
The neighborhood meeting for MA 19-01 will be held on April 22, 2019 from 9 to 10 a.m. at Rolesville Community Center (514 Southtown Cir.) The applicant will receive public comments.

The Planning Board will consider the case and the results from the neighborhood meeting at 7:00 p.m. the same day.
